{{also|Fehlen}} ==German== ===Etymology=== Via {{etyl|gmh|de}} and {{etyl|fro|de}} from {{etyl|la|de}} ''[[fallere]]'', cognate English ''[[fail]]'' ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈfeːlən/}} * {{audio|de|De-fehlen.ogg|(Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-fehlen.ogg|(Austria)}} * {{hyphenation|de|feh|len}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-weak|fehlt|fehlte|gefehlt}} # to [[lack]] # to [[be]] [[absent]] # {{lb|de|dated}} to [[fail]] ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-weak|fehl|gefehlt|h}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|verfehlen}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
